articles.author: CBC.ca
articles.title: First Nations leader apologizes, walks back support for Northern Gateway pipeline in B.C.
articles.description: The Union of B.C. Indian Chiefs said in a statement that the answer to the Northern Gateway pipeline from Alberta to the Pacific "is still no," after Alberta Premier Danielle Smith suggested reviving the project in light of U.S. President Donald Trump's threat of tariffs on Canadian exports.
articles.content:
The president of the Union of B.C. Indian Chiefs apologized Wednesday and walked back comments he made earlier this week suggesting he supported reviving the Northern Gateway pipeline project.
"I do not support resuscitating dead projects such as the... [4544 chars]

articles.title: Meta says it didn't force users to follow President Trump on Facebook and Instagram
articles.description: The company also said it was working to resolve an issue where some words, including "Democrats" and "Republican," were blocked from Instagram search.
